籤詩版本二:
Ke ulu nei nā paina ulu a me nā kaʻa, a ʻo ka ua, ka hau, ka makani, a me ka hau nā mea a pau e hana ai.
E lilo koke ka wā e hiki mai ana i mea hoʻohana nui, a lilo ka kaulana i kia.
詩意:
ʻO kēia hexagram ke kiʻi o kahi ululāʻau nui o nā pine a me nā kaʻa.
He hanohano ma na mea a pau.
解曰: Laki maikai ma ke alanui. ʻO ka lawelawe hanohano o ke ola. Ua oo na enuhe silika. Ua pōmaikaʻi ka ʻohana.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua hoʻoholo ʻo Fan Wenzheng e huki a huki i ka porridge
ʻO Fan Zhongyan, he luna kaulana o ka Song Dynasty, no ka ʻohana ʻilihune i kona wā ʻōpiopio. Ua aʻo ʻo ia i loko o ka hale mōneka ma Changbai Mountain. Ua kuke ʻo ia i ka porridge me ʻelua lita o ka millet i kēlā me kēia lā. Ma hope o ka paʻa ʻana i ka pō, ʻoki ʻo ia. i ʻehā ʻāpana me ka pahi, ʻai ʻo ia i ʻelua ʻāpana i ke kakahiaka a me ke ahiahi, a ʻokiʻoki i nā pīkī e ʻai ai.
Hoʻohana ʻia kēia e wehewehe i ka mea makaʻu ʻole i ka paʻakikī, aʻo ikaika, a lilo i talena hoʻohana nui.
E ʻoki i ka harrow a huki porridge
聖意: ʻO Jiazhai ka pōmaikaʻi iā ia iho, e ʻimi ana i ka waiwai, ka maluhia, ka ʻoihana, ka male, ka lanakila, Liujia, nā kāne hele wāwae, nā kahua hilinaʻi, nā ʻano silika, ʻeono holoholona, ​​ka pōʻino, ka huli ʻana i nā kānaka, nā hoʻopiʻi, ka neʻe ʻana, ka waiwai nalowale, ka maʻi, Anshan lua, auspiciousness
古人: Hoʻoholo ʻo Fan Wenzheng e huki a huki i ka porridge
